Entities.Name: Smoking Status
Entities.Definition: Classification of an individual's smoking behavior, which is extracted from medical discharge summaries.

Sample Data.Sentence: She is a past smoker, but quit two years ago.

Entities.Name: Non-Smoker
Entities.Definition: A patient who has never smoked.

Entities.Name: Current Smoker
Entities.Definition: A patient who has smoked within the past year.

Sample Data.Sentence: She quit smoking four months ago.

Entities.Name: Unknown
Entities.Definition: Smoking status of the patient is not mentioned in the discharge summary.

Sample Data.Sentence: Patient's smoking status is not documented in the discharge summary.

Dataset.Name: Discharge Summaries from Partners HealthCare
Dataset.Details: A collection of de-identified discharge summaries used for NLP challenges to automatically determine smoking status as part of the i2b2 project.

Annotation Guidelines.Link: No specific link provided, but the process involved pulmonologists classifying smoking status into distinct categories based on explicit mentions within the discharge summaries.
